instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00165: What is 820-00165? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.PLT_RESET_L: What is PLT_RESET_L? PLT_RESET_L is platform reset, this signal keeps the system from POSTing. _L means the signal is asserted when its voltage is low. .
definitions.SMC_LID: What is SMC_LID? SMC_LID tells the machine the system is open when it is 3.3v to 3.4v, and closed when it is low such as 0v-0.6v. When this signal is low, the machine may go to sleep or have no backlight. .

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> boot first time, after have to wait get cold to boot again
threads.message:
No water damage, logic board is like new.


This is the behaviour: 

First time when logic board is cold it boots ok and load system. All is working fine. When shut it down it stop working. Fan spins, CPU get hot but no image, no chime. In this momento absolutly all rails are present and ok but still no image. I have already boot with clean EFI but no change. 


PRAM; NVRAM; SMC RESET (also changed it from donot) are done with no changes.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> boot first time, after have to wait get cold to boot again
threads.message: The board stays off when you turn it off, or fan remains on?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> boot first time, after have to wait get cold to boot again
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> boot first time, after have to wait get cold to boot again
threads.message:
<SIGNAL>PLT_RESET_L</SIGNAL> gos high, when gets stuck and doesn't boot?
Try disconnecting airport and internal SSD.

threads.message: <SIGNAL>PLT_RESET_L</SIGNAL>  -3.3 when not boot. ssd and airport already disconnected with no changes

threads.message: How the fault appeared, what said the client?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> boot first time, after have to wait get cold to boot again
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> boot first time, after have to wait get cold to boot again
threads.message:
Board stays on, but no image.
Did you test for USB activity?
Test the board without LIO flex.
Check <SIGNAL>SMC_LID</SIGNAL> level.
